tweet: 1/ We're thrilled to announce the Smart Contract Summit taking place on May 7th, 2020 in Brooklyn, NY! SmartCon 0 will feature the top minds & builders of smart contracts and celebrate our incredible community, thriving ecosystem & cutting-edge research.  https://t.co/Ijypvv0Mlp

3/ Speakers include @SergeyNazarov, @AriJuels, @yorkerhodes, @EdFelten, @jwolpert, @fribeiro1, @awrigh01, @hudsonjameson. Founders: @synthetix_io, @loopringorg, @SetProtocol, @iEx_ec, @RealTPlatform, @AmpleforthOrg, @Dolomite_io, @bzxHQ. Many more to come!  https://t.co/3yLGMlqzq7
